Get names of all features in an assay/experiment

Source: R/methods-features_in_assay.R
features_in_assay.Rd

Returns the names of all features in an assay/modality

Usage

features_in_assay(object, assay, ...)

# S3 method for class 'Seurat'
features_in_assay(object, assay)

# S3 method for class 'SingleCellExperiment'
features_in_assay(object, assay)

# S3 method for class 'AnnDataR6'
features_in_assay(object, assay)

Arguments

object

a single-cell object.

assay

the name of an assay/modality for which to view features

...

Currently unused.

Methods (by class)

  • features_in_assay(Seurat): Seurat objects

  • features_in_assay(SingleCellExperiment): SingleCellExperiment objects

  • features_in_assay(AnnDataR6): Anndata objects
